nodes.text: Otoh Langua was a small Gungan city on Naboo. Like most Gungan settlements, it was attacked by the droid army of the Trade Federation in 32 BBY, forcing its inhabitants to relocate to a sacred place deep in the Lianorm Swamp. Oma Prumba, a militiagung from Langua, participated in the ensuing Battle of Naboo.
